mapper.select: select hb.h_id , min(ha.uuid) as uuid , min(ha.fileName) as fileName , max(ha.uploadPath) as uploadPath , ROUND(avg(hr_score), 2) as avg_score , max(hb.memberId) as memberId , max(hb.nickName) as nickName , max(hb.h_title) as h_title , max(hb.h_price) as h_price , max(hb.h_updatedate) as h_updatedate , max(hb.h_addr) as h_addr , max(hb.h_locate_X) as h_locate_X , max(hb.h_locate_Y) as h_locate_Y , max(hb.h_cnt) as h_cnt from homegym_board as hb join homegym_attach as ha on hb.h_id = ha.h_id left outer join homegym_review as hr on hr.h_id = hb.h_id where h_addr like concat('%', #{cri.keyword}, '%') group by hb.h_id order by hb.h_updatedate desc LIMIT #{cri.amount} OFFSET #{cri.skip};
